## Changes

1. Universal Autocomplete Detection

   - Returns generic selector: ''role=listbox >> role=option >> nth=0''
   - NO site-specific hardcoding - works universally

2. Strategy Details
   - Triggers on: autocomplete/suggestion/first/option keywords
   - Waits 200ms for options to render
   - Checks listbox visibility before returning selector
   - Score: 0.96 (high confidence)
